description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models: A generic device designed to close, or open, or both, one or more electric circuits.  All switches are two terminal devices including grounding switches.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Property. switch name. For example, Switch_01

contents.name: normalOpen
contents.description: Property. The attribute is used in cases when no Measurement for the status value is present. If the Switch has a status measurement the Discrete.normalValue is expected to match with the Switch.normalOpen. Default: False

contents.name: MemberOf_EquipmentContainer
contents.description: The relation to equipment container which is < voltage_level > in case of a switch
